text_block_list.text:
Through trial and error, I had come up with a menu. 
By getting some advice from Sensei, I was able to come up 
with something suitable for the week until the mock race.

I've confirmed the training menu! This is amazing! Being 
able to identify my weaknesses so easily……I'm surprised!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
But this menu wasn't just to overcome her weaknesses. To be 
more precise, it was a menu to increase what she was able to do.

Narita Top Road had a really long stride. 
This meant her rate of acceleration was quite 
high, and she could reach her top speed quickly.

Because of her long stride, that meant she could fully 
demonstrate her strengths on courses with long straights.

If she wasn't able to fully shift gears for 
any reason, then she would struggle. For example, 
tight corners and adjusting her pace――

Y-yeah. Honestly, I struggle with it. At the start 
or when trying to pull away from the group, if I have 
to suddenly dash or slow down, it doesn't go well……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
And particularly when the ground is in poor condition, 
my feet always tend to slip and I can't run like I want to.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
……Sorry. 
If only I was more skillful――
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: That wasn't an issue. That's why I made this menu after all.

! Y-yeah! You're right, that's why I'm doing this training…… 
It's the menu that Trainer-san made after all.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
That's amazing. Really……well, it's just amazing! 
Just by watching me run a few times, to be able 
to come up with this……thank you very much!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Can I start running then!? 
I want to put this menu in to practice right away!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Alright! Then, I'll get started. If there's anything that 
catches your attention, let me know please. Well then!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
As soon as I said that, Narita Top Road ran off. 
I couldn't help but smile at her enthusiasm.

How should I put it――It seemed like just watching 
her run could make you look on the brighter 
side of things. It was a mysterious power.

Haa haa, haa……! 
Rely on my speed, and find the best route……!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
(Trainer-san prepared some markers for me…… 
so try to focus on those――!)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Kuu……! I failed……! 
Once more, at the next corner……!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Class Rep Top Road-! Do. Your. Best. At training!!
text_block_list.name: Classmate Uma Musume

text_block_list.text: (She's……cheering for me……!)
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: ……Right! Thanks alot!!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: YaaaaAAAAA!!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Even if it was to overcome her weaknesses, the 
menu was kind of monotonous. Repeating the same 
thing over and over until your body remembered it.

It would be easier to get results by focusing on one thing 
instead of many in such a short period of time―― However――

Haa, haa……haa…… 
Another failure……It just feels like my feet are so unstable……
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
After just a few hours it would probably start feeling boring. 
If it started lowering her motivation, I'd have to revise this plan――

Nnn! Once more!! 
Trainer-san, do you have any advice for me!?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
She was so lively, it was as if she had just 
started training. That was what it seemed like 
by the look in her eyes when she asked me.

Got it! It doesn't help to focus on my feet. 
Thank you very much, I'll get going!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
I decided to take my own advice and 
watch over her while she ran.

A few days later. After training was finished, 
I found Narita Top Road doing more self-training.

Fuuu-……that felt good! 
Alright, this time once I get to that corner--
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text: Hyowaaa!!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
T-Trainer-san!? 
What brings you here?
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Ah……hehe, I guess you found out. I'm sorry. 
But, I just wanted to do everything I could.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
Even if it's just a mock race, it's the first 
race I'm challenging together with Trainer-san.
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
……so I can reassure Trainer-san about choosing me, 
that's the kind of race it is!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
……That makes me happy. But, that doesn't mean I want her 
to be reckless. After all, it's the trainer that should 
be the one lending their strength towards a better result.

It's a mock race with Uma Musume that have veteran trainers. 
Will I……be able to let her run the way she wants to?
Everyone's cheering for me, so I'm looking forward to it!
text_block_list.name: Narita Top Road

text_block_list.text:
The mock race is soon. I was the complete opposite 
of Narita Top Road, who showed a dazzling smile.
